sections.heading: Liability for injury to livestock on unfenced railroad; contributory negligence3-1703
sections.text: Liability for injury to livestock on unfenced railroad; contributory negligenceA. When livestock is injured or killed by a locomotive or cars on the line of a railroad unfenced by good and sufficient fence or other
